akas: Emma una strega da favola Italy
akas from release info: Emma una strega da favola Italy

-1.title: Apocalypse world
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Discovery
1.plot: Upon moving to her new home in Miami, strange things start happening to Emma as she meets her new crush, Daniel, and her new enemy, Maddie -- Daniel's jealous and popular ex-girlfriend who has mysterious powers of her own.

2.title: The Big Rescue
2.plot: Emma and Maddie have a hard time mastering their powers after discovering that they are indeed witches. Meanwhile, the Sharks set off a smoke bomb to get out of taking a test but things quickly get out of hand.

3.title: The Big Chill
3.plot: When Maddie casts a spell on Emma, the girl lands in the nurse's office where she meets Lily, the school nurse and her magical Guardian. Lily reveals that Emma may be the Chosen One and her powers could be stolen at the upcoming eclipse.

4.title: I'm a Witch
4.plot: Emma 's magical powers intensify when she finds the Hexoren. While Maddie learns to undo spells, Diego tries to hide his discovery that he has powers of his own. Emma prepares for her first date with Daniel.

5.title: Magic Fight Club
5.plot: The Principal catches Emma and Maddie having a magic fight in the hallway and starts to become suspicious. Katie finds herself the subject of Diego and Mac's affections.

6.title: Monkey Business
6.plot: Maddie tries to use Tony's magic show to win back Daniel's affection. The Principal seems to be on to Emma. Lily finds out the Principal's awful secret, but before she can warn Emma she must fend off an angry Maddie.

7.title: Monkey Business II
7.plot: Lily has been turned into a monkey and Emma must work to change Lily back before anyone finds out. Diego continues to explore his newfound powers, and the Sharks become suspicious.

8.title: Mac-sic-cle
8.plot: While Emma and Daniel patch things up, the Panthers devise a plan to steal the Hexoren. Diego's powers spiral out of control, putting his friends in danger.

9.title: I Said, Upside Down
9.plot: Now that Maddie has the Hexoren she is more powerful than ever. Julio tells Diego the truth about his strange powers. Daniel finally tells Emma that he wants to go out with her.

10.title: I-Guana Dance with You
10.plot: The Principal catches Maddie in the middle of spell and discovers that Maddie is a witch. Meanwhile, Julio and Lily realize they both belong to the magical realm and Emma is asked to erase Tony's memory.

11.title: I-Guana You Back
11.plot: Maddie romances an iguana, believing that it is Daniel. When she tries to change him back, she accidentally turns a chameleon into a boy. The Principal ramps up plans to steal the Chosen One's powers at the Eclipse.

12.title: I Heart Beau
12.plot: Tony complicates Emma's relationship with Daniel. Maddie and the Panthers get to know Beau, the lizard-turned-boy, and Diego learns the origin of his powers.

13.title: Pantherized
13.plot: After Maddie turns Andi into a Panther, it's up to Emma and Tony to hatch a plan to rescue Andi and reclaim the Hexoren. Lily reveals some disturbing secrets about the magical beings at Iridium High.

14.title: Walk Like a Panther
14.plot: Andi has to keep "playing Panther" in an effort to get the Hexoren back.

15.title: Beach Ball
15.plot: Emotions run high at Beach Ball between Emma and Daniel. At the game, Maddie and Diego make some revelations.

16.title: Lily Frog
16.plot: The Principal puts pressure on Andi to tell her the location of the Witches Council.

17.title: Witches' Flu
17.plot: Emma gets the flu and can't control her powers. The Principal takes a special interest in Maddie.

18.title: Hexoren Squared
18.plot: The Principal catches the T3 sneaking into the high school and makes a bold decision.

19.title: Which Witch Is Which
19.plot: Daniel learns the truth about Emma and Maddie. Diego discovers the Principal's plans for the Eclipse and turns to the Sharks for help.

20.title: The Chosen One
20.plot: The Principal uses Daniel to lure Emma to an empty theater, where she plans to steal The Chosen One's powers for good.

21.title: A Witch's Tale
21.plot: This half hour special will take a closer look at what's happened thus far in season one and give a sneak peak at the big moments yet to come!

1.title: Jax of Hearts
1.plot: Lily warns Emma that the Witches' Council will not allow her to date Daniel; a new wizard arrives at Iridium High.

2.title: Runaway Witch
2.plot: The Witches' Council confronts Emma about dating a human; Diego finds a way to improve Maddie's mood.

3.title: Love Pie Redux
3.plot: Jax gets Emma in trouble; Katie, Sophie and Diego try to convince Maddie that she has her powers back; Maddie's mother makes a special pie for Francisco.

4.title: Powers by Proxy
4.plot: Emma and Maddie receive some disturbing news while Jax schemes to get Daniel in trouble. Andi discovers a pair of magic goggles.

5.title: The Fool Moon
5.plot: Desdemona takes a job at Iridium High in order to help Emma through the Fool Moon. Andi and Maddie both discover Jax's true nature.

6.title: Daniel Who?
6.plot: Emma and Jax accidentally wipe out Daniel's entire memory after he sees Emma casting a spell; Diego tries to win Maddie's forgiveness.

7.title: No Can Do
7.plot: During the Fool Moon, Emma is having trouble controlling her powers. Jax shows his softer side and Diego discovers a new power.

8.title: Werewolves in Siberia
8.plot: Agamemnon casts a few mysterious spells on Emma after she refuses to break up with Daniel. Katie and Sophie have had enough of Diego hogging Maddie.

9.title: The No-Sleep Sleepover
9.plot: When Daniel, Diego and Jax crash a sleepover at Maddie's house, they encounter a mysterious creature.

10.title: Outta Hand
10.plot: Jax talks Emma into skipping school; Maddie learns who stole her powers; Diego is willing to risk everything to help Maddie.

11.title: Double Trouble
11.plot: Emma is out of control after learning a new cloning spell from Jax; Maddie and Diego investigate alternative ways to restore her powers.

12.title: The Emma Squad
12.plot: Emma's cloning spell makes her social life go haywire; Maddie asks Lily to help her strengthen her powers.

13.title: Missminion
13.plot: After finding out she has been keeping her powers a secret, Daniel breaks up with Emma. Maddie is happy she has her powers back but has trouble using them, so Diego helps her. Gigi finds out about magic.

14.title: The Breakup
14.plot: Desdemona makes Gigi her minion; tensions are high after Daniel and Emma break up; the T3 decide to prank Emma.

15.title: Emma Wants a Cracker
15.plot: Emma accidentally turns herself into a bird and Daniel tries to change her back; Maddie gets angry when her face shows her moods.

16.title: Stormageddon
16.plot: During a magical storm: Emma and Jax get trapped in an office, Diego and Andi are at the Seven together, Maddie and Daniel have fun at Daniels house, and Ramona escapes from Limbo.

17.title: About a Wizard
17.plot: Jax makes a sacrifice for Emma; Desdemona wants to get Emma and Daniel back together; Maddie and Sophie plan a surprise party for Katie.

18.title: Beach Birthday Bash
18.plot: Desdemona casts a spell on Daniel at Katie's party; the T3 constructs their biggest prank, but cannot decide on the victim; Lily is suspicious of Desdemona.

19.title: Zombie Boyfriend
19.plot: Emma brings Andi's favorite video game character to life; Ursula tells Maddie to stop dating Diego; Desdemona frames Lily; the T3 pull a prank at the school play.

20.title: Once Upon a Spell
20.plot: Reviewing what has happened so far in season two; preview of upcoming moments.

21.title: Andi & Philip, Sittin' in a Tree
21.plot: Andi helps her zombie boyfriend pass as a human; Katie forces Maddie to make her a boyfriend; Agamemnon begins to uncover Desdemona's plot.

22.title: BF-Never
22.plot: Emma and Andi's friendship is put in jeopardy; Agamemnon falls into harm's way; Diego discovers that he has the ability to create portals.

23.title: The Abyss
23.plot: Evil Emma tries to ruin Emma and Daniel's relationship; Diego and the Panthers receive a message; Andi makes a deal with Jax.

24.title: Emma vs. Emma
24.plot: Emma and Daniel are in serious danger. Desdemona and Evil Emma make a pact to destroy the Magical Realm. Emma and friends must stop Desdemona and Evil Emma from destroying the Magic Realm and taking over all of humankind.

1.title: Beachside 7
1.plot: Emma freezes time and cannot undo the spell. Meanwhile, a new witch named Mia shows up and causes some drama.

2.title: Rebel Emma
2.plot: Emma is sent to boot camp as punishment for casting spells in public.

3.title: Always You
3.plot: Mia flirts with Daniel, and Emma catches her. Meanwhile, Andi wants to become the first human Guardian; and Diego discovers more about being a Kanay.

4.title: Breaking All the Rules
4.plot: Emma and Andi try to break into the Magic Realm. Maddie and Diego want to repair witch/Kanay relationships (starting with Ursula) and Mia causes all kinds of trouble.

5.title: Neverending Summer
5.plot: Gigi organized the Neverending Summer Party as farewell to summer vacation. Jax and the rest of the Rebel Witches and Wizards took their final test to graduate Boot Camp. The T3 are trying to find a way to bust the H2O of their pranks. Jax showed up at the party as a graduate from the Boot Camp making Emmma proud of him which caused Daniel to be jealous again. Mia transformed as Emma so she could trick Daniel of talking to her. Mia in the form of Emma kissed Daniel transferring the Spider Seal on him.

6.title: Daniel Darko
6.plot: Daniel starts acting strange because of a spider seal.

7.title: No More Mr. Nice Guy
7.plot: Daniel continues to act strangely. Jax thinks he has lost his powers and Mia schemes to become Katie's best friend.

8.title: Spider No More
8.plot: Mia and Daniel wreak havoc in the school and plot against Emma. Maddie tries to convince Katie that Mia is not her friend.

9.title: Back to Back
9.plot: A mysterious crystal magically binds Emma and Maddie together. Daniel becomes sick. The H2O pull a prank.

10.title: El Cristal de Caballero
10.plot: After being informed of what happened to Daniel, Mia removed the spider seal on him. He can't remember every single detail of what has occured in the span of a week, so the gang filled him in. Daniel finally broke-up with Mia and got back together with Emma.

11.title: Kanay vs. Kanay
11.plot: Diego, upon finding out the Mia is a fellow Kanay, caught up with her and told Diego a brief history of her family. Andi and Jax figured out the whereabouts of the last piece of the crystal. So the try to break-in into the principal's office where they got busted. Desperate to get through the walls immediately, Jax accidentally turned himself into a ferret but later escaped Andi transporting him to where Maddie and Emma are. Meanwhile, Emma and Maddie is still struggling to get out of the Janitor's Closet/Gigi's Studio that was deep frozen by Mia. As this happens, ...

12.title: Invisible Me
12.plot: When Jax accidentally makes Andi invisible, she takes advantage of her new status to try to trap Mia; Mia conspires with Katie against Emma.

13.title: The Truth About Kanays
13.plot: Andi remains invisible, so Emma and Jax work on correcting the situation. Meanwhile, the Cristal de Caballero dissappears.

14.title: Zombie Rescue Team
14.plot: Mia's scheming reaches a peak when she freezes Andi. Diego is torn between helping Mia or standing by Andi.

15.title: Enchanted Ever After
15.plot: Reviewing what has happened so far in Season 3; preview of upcoming moments.

16.title: Kangaroo Jax
16.plot: After Jax refuses to share information regarding Emma's powers, the Council turns him into a kangaroo. Daniel and Andi must keep Phillip well-behaved after Daniel brings him to school.

17.title: Defiance
17.plot: Emma and Daniel search for the kangaroo before Francisco contacts animal control. Mia challenges Diego to a duel. Gigi tries to figure out who destroyed her video equipment.

18.title: Magical Throwdown
18.plot: Emma and Andi want turn Phillip into a human. Gigi gives her memory card to Black Hawk. Diego trains for his Kanay duel with Mia.

19.title: The Kanay Strikes Back
19.plot: Emma and Andi struggle with turning Phillip into a human. Diego and Mia engage in a Kanay duel. Agamemnon and Desdemona try to stop Emma's plan.

20.title: New Witch Order
20.plot: When Emma and Mia get sucked into a videogame, it's up to their friends to save them. Lily and the Panthers try to get Gigi's memory card and prevent the Realm from being exposed.

1.title: A World Without You
1.plot: Emma has chosen Jax over Daniel and Daniel has disappeared. Emma tries to find out what has happened.

2.title: Road Trippin'
2.plot: Emma and the gang go out on a road trip to find Daniel. When they get there how will everything turn out?

3.title: Ever in the Everglades
3.plot: Emma finds Daniel and in the Everglades and wants him to remember his life in Miami. Everybody takes a ride on a airboat through the Everglades.

4.title: Stuck in a Storm
4.plot: Katie, Sophie and Gigi are lost in the Everglades as a big storm approaches - and an unexpected visitor turns up to rescue them.

5.title: A Tale of Two Lives
5.plot: Emma makes another Continuum break, which puts Daniel and his family in danger.

6.title: Twisted Sister
6.plot: Emma tries her best to restore Daniel's memory but time is running out. Jax meets his long lost sister.

7.title: Lunch at Lola's
7.plot: The gang goes to a restaurant in Miami named Lola's. They have a magical experience with Talia.

8.title: Monkey Face Emoji
8.plot: Daniel thinks that Maddie is his girlfriend. And Jax searches for information about his mother.

9.title: The Final Countdown
9.plot: Jax learns the truth about his family. Emma does everything she can to restore Daniel's memory in the few hours he has left.

10.title: Diego's Wipedown
10.plot: After the Continuum break ends, Emma works hard to restore her relationship with Jax; Maddie tries to get Diego to forgive her.

11.title: Van Pelt Reunion
11.plot: Emma misses her mother and becomes consumed with finding out more about her. An unwelcomed guest shows up at the Van Pelt reunion.

12.title: Back to Square One
12.plot: Emma considers going back in time to save her mother. Daniel wants to return to the Everglades. Jake and Jessie go into hiding.

13.title: Power in a Bottle
13.plot: Jax discovers where Jake and Jessie are hiding; Emma continues to abuse her magic and strips the Council of its powers.

14.title: What If?
14.plot: Emma's search for a time manipulation spell causes a huge rift between her and Andi; Diego searches for more Kanays.

15.title: Frenemies
15.plot: Emma works to become more powerful in order to cast the time manipulation spell, even though it means alienating all of her friends. Jake attempts to see his family again.

16.title: Forever Charmed
16.plot: A special episode which summarizes what happened so far in season 4 and previews the following episodes.

17.title: Stop Emma
17.plot: Emma's friends decide they must stop her for good. Jake has surprising information for Jax.

18.title: Mommie Dearest
18.plot: The group stages a "witchervention" for Emma. Jax finally learns the truth about his family.

19.title: A Girl's Sacrifice
19.plot: Emma's friends must save her when her plans go horribly awry. Emma is forced to make several tough decisions.

imdb.plot outline: When Emma and her single father move to a new town, she thinks all she'll have to deal with is making new friends - until she starts developing strange powers and discovers she's part of a magical world, full of witches, Guardians and Kanays. Soon, she's trying to master her power, before spoiled, bad witch Maddie steals them. To make matters worse, she falls hard and fast for Daniel, the school's swim team champion and Maddie's boyfriend. Over time Emma learns to control her powers and finds out that she is the Chosen One (the most powerful witch ever born). In addition, she discovers that the school's evil principal wants to steal the Chosen One's powers. Emma must stop her and keep her powers hidden from a skeptical Daniel, who hates magic. Everything comes to a head during the big school dance, when the Principal holds Daniel hostage and the two young witches must work together to defeat her.
imdb.title: Every Witch Way
plot: A teenage girl deals with moving to a new town, growing up and falling in love, all while realizing that she's a witch.::Anonymous

When Emma and her single father move to a new town, she thinks all she'll have to deal with is making new friends - until she starts developing strange powers and discovers she's part of a magical world, full of witches, Guardians and Kanays. Soon, she's trying to master her power, before spoiled, bad witch Maddie steals them. To make matters worse, she falls hard and fast for Daniel, the school's swim team champion and Maddie's boyfriend. Over time Emma learns to control her powers and finds out that she is the Chosen One (the most powerful witch ever born). In addition, she discovers that the school's evil principal wants to steal the Chosen One's powers. Emma must stop her and keep her powers hidden from a skeptical Daniel, who hates magic. Everything comes to a head during the big school dance, when the Principal holds Daniel hostage and the two young witches must work together to defeat her.::Nickelodeon
